EmailTemplate.name: OGE-450 Certification Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! Your OGE 450 Report has been certified.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Forms__c.Type_1_Owner_Contact__c},
Your OGE 450 report has been certified by your Deputy Ethics Official. You may view your certified report by going into the EPA Business Application Platform and selecting “My Forms”.
Thanks for taking your ethics obligations seriously and for filing your report. If you have any ethics questions or concerns, then feel free to contact your own Deputy Ethics Official or OGC’s Ethics Office at ethics@epa.gov.
See you next filing season! Your EPA Ethics Officials
